DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness Healthy Lifestyles Passport Program ( HLPP ) prevent infant childhood obesity . It hypothesize participant intervention arm exhibit less excessive weight-for-length gain 4- 6-months age . In 2-years 5-years , predict participant intervention arm yield lower Body Mass Index ( BMI ) z-scores participant control arm , receive usual care .
DOC.brief_title: The Healthy Lifestyles Passport Program : Nutrition Education Program Prevent Childhood Obesity
DOC.criteria: pregnant woman third trimester ( > 28 week gestation ) receive care institution 's Women 's Health Center medical condition complicate pregnancy must able communicate English Spanish reachable phone plan consistent caretaker child least 75 % time plan attend institution 's pediatric outpatient clinic child 's routine healthcare Child disable chronic illness Any exist and/or preexist disable chronic illness would qualify mother `` high risk '' Wards state Mothers disabling/serious chronic illness Drug/alcohol use pregnancy
